title: Monocacy National Battlefield: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park               News   Keep informed with the latest news and information about Monocacy National Battlefield.        Pictures & Videos   Pictures are worth a thousand words!          History & Culture   Learn about the soldiers who fought the Battle of Monocacy and the people who once called the banks of the Monocacy River home.              Nature   Monocacy National Battlefield is home to many plants and animals.        Education   Think of Monocacy National Battlefield as a unique classroom filled with resources that can help achieve curriculum goals!        Kids & Youth   Activities for kids of all ages              Management   Park management carries out the mission of the National Park Service to inspire, educate, facilitate exploration for future generations.        Bookstore   Find publications, maps, multimedia and theme-related merchandise.
